member.postal_address: Office 801, 47A Evelpidon & 33 Lefkados Str., GR-113 62 Athens, Greece

shortcv.p: Eirini Kalliamvakou is a research assistant at the Athens University of Economics and Business in ELTRUN (the e-Business Center) and is currently working in the GUIDE project (funded by the EU). She has also been accepted as a PhD candidate in November 2004 in the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB). Eirini holds a Bachelor in Economics from the University of Athens and an MSc in Decision Sciences (specialization in E-Business) from the Athens University of Economics and Business. Her research interests concern the identity of the Internet user and the members of virtual communities, security issues that arise in such communities as well as cases of deception and criminal activity on the Internet.
